publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-451# Mrs Margaret Ewing: Warm Homes Weekâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Energy Action Scotland on its unrelenting work to remove fuel poverty from Scotland; notes the progress that has been made through its campaigning, and considers that all MSPs should support the Warm Homes Week programme between 28 November and 8 December 2003. R Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham*, Linda Fabiani*, Campbell Martin*

S2M-451# Warm Homes Week (lodged on 3 October 2003) Stewart Stevenson*, Fergus Ewing*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Rob Gibson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Christine May*, Mark Ballard*, Donald Gorrie*, Michael Matheson*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Brian Adam*, Jim Mather*, Eleanor Scott*, Patrick Harvie*, Shiona Baird*, Des McNulty*
